nodes.documentation:
Accepts donations and increments the amount withdrawable
by contract owner
nodes.name: donateToOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "No donations for owner to withdraw"

arguments.value: No donations for owner to withdraw

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "No donations for owner to withdraw"

nodes.documentation:
Withdraws all funds that contrat owner is allowed to access.
Players must specifically choose to donate to owner to give them access.
nodes.name: withdrawDonationsToOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev counts the number of values between 0 and 18 in the first 5 digits of a 32 byte hex hash
nodes.name: countTargetsInFirst5Bytes

nodes.documentation:
given 3 unique cells on a ticket,
awards a win if hashes of all 3 cells contain the same number of zeros in their hash
prize is <ticket.price> ^ number of targets
nodes.name: redeemWin

nodes.name: countTargetsInFirst5Bytes

given 3 unique cells on a ticket,
awards a win if hashes of all 3 cells contain the same number of zeros in their hash

nodes.name: redeemWin

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

donateToOwner().notice: Accepts donations and increments the amount withdrawable by contract owner

redeemWin(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: given 3 unique cells on a ticket, awards a win if hashes of all 3 cells contain the same number of zeros in their hash prize is <ticket.price> ^ number of targets

withdrawDonationsToOwner().notice: Withdraws all funds that contrat owner is allowed to access. Players must specifically choose to donate to owner to give them access.
